description: Change of use from A4 (Public House) to D1 (community centre with prayer facilities) (application for Listed Building consent)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 2 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (786/IDC/SU-100, 786/IDC/PP-200, 786/IDC/PP-102 Rev A, Heritage Statement: Received 21/02/2019. 
786/IDC/SU-300, Outline Construction Logistics Plan, Transport Statement: Received 26/02/2019. 
A Forward to the Scope of Works Schedule, Comment Response Note: Received 20/05/2019. 
Design, Access, Sustainability & Planning Statement: Received 01/07/2019.
Travel Plan, Comment Response Note - Version 3, July 2019: Received 11/07/2019.
786/IDC/PP-101 Rev B, 786/IDC/PP-100 Rev B: Received 17/07/2019.
786/IDC/IF-200 Rev A: Received 23/08/2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No new plumbing, pipes, soil stacks, flues, vents, grills, security
alarms or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building
unless shown on the drawings hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - Details in respect of the following shall be submitted to and approved
in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the relevant work is
begun. The relevant work shall be carried out in accordance with such
approved details.
a) Details of the proposed secondary gate
b) Details of the proposed external emergency staircase
c) Details of proposed rainwater goods
d) Details of any replacement roof tiles
e) Details of the proposed secondary glazing

Condition : 6 - No development shall take place until 1:20 scale drawings showing
how the hereby permitted secondary glazing fittings would be fixed
have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning
authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the
approved details.

Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the approved drawings, before any works to the
building are commenced, the details of renovation of the hanging sign
in the north-east corner of the property shall be submitted to and
approved by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be
completed according to the approved specification and retained for
the lifetime of the development.
